resources.string: To use QSync, please install it on your others devices and connect them to the same Wifi network :D \n\n Visit : https://thaaoblues.github.io/qsync
Accept the Largage Aerien ? File name:
Accept the MULTI Largage Aerien ? Coming from :
Select a device to send a Largage Aerien
First feature of QSync : Largage Aerien, It is just AirDrop but better because it is open-source.
Second feature of QSync : You can synchronize any folder between any of your devices (pictures, documents…), it will update whenever they are on the same network !
Third feature of QSync : Our markeplace let you install apps that will use QSync to synchronise their data between your devices !
Last feature of QSync : You can activate "Backup mode" on any of your synchronisation task so anything you delete on this device will not be deleted on the others ! Usefull for your pictures ;)
